series_list.rise_message:
-Bonus Drop Rate Details
This Relic Draw does not have a drop rate bonus. The 5★ or higher relics that drop in this Relic Draw are always Soul Break relics of the specified type or Legend Materia.

-Guaranteed 5★ or Higher Relic in Rare Relic Draw x11
One 5★ or higher relic is guaranteed to drop in each Rare Relic Draw x11.

-Purchasing Relic Draws with Mythril and Gems
If you don’t have enough Mythril to purchase a Rare Relic Draw, Rare Relic Draw x3, or Rare Relic Draw x11, you can spend all of your Mythril and use Gems to make up the difference. The number of Gems required is calculated automatically. Please be aware that the number of Gems needed when using a combination of Mythril and Gems differs from the number of Gems needed when using only Gems to purchase a Relic Draw.
* If you have enough Mythril to purchase a given Relic Draw, the option to combine Mythril and Gems will not be available.
* When purchasing a Relic Draw with a combination of Mythril and Gems, all of your Mythril will be used. It is not possible to adjust the amount of Mythril spent.
* The drop rates of a Relic Draw purchased with a combination of Mythril and Gems are the same as those purchased using only Mythril or only Gems.
NOTE: Relic Draws for some events may not include Relics higher than 5★. Please check the Relics menu of a Relic Draw to see if it includes any 5★ or higher relics.

-Bonus Drop Rate Details
This Relic Draw does not have a drop rate bonus. The 5★ or higher relics that drop in this Relic Draw are always Soul Break relics of the specified type or Legend Materia.

-Guaranteed 5★ or Higher Relic in Rare Relic Draw x11

-Purchasing Relic Draws with Mythril and Gems
If you don’t have enough Mythril to purchase a Rare Relic Draw x11, you can spend all of your Mythril and use Gems to make up the difference. The number of Gems required is calculated automatically. Please be aware that the number of Gems needed when using a combination of Mythril and Gems differs from the number of Gems needed when using only Gems to purchase a Relic Draw.
* If you have enough Mythril to purchase a given Relic Draw, the option to combine Mythril and Gems will not be available.

-Anima Lenses
In this relic draw, you can receive the following Anima Lenses when you draw a relic that you've previously obtained.
6★: Lv 3 Anima Lens x50
5★: Lv 2 Anima Lens x50
4★: Lv 1 Anima Lens x7
3★: Lv 1 Anima Lens x3
* Relics in your Equipment Collection are considered "previously obtained."
* Anima Lenses are acquired automatically.
* 4★ and lower relics that are sold or used to create Rainbow Crystals will still award Anima Lenses.
* Tap the Lenses button at the bottom left of the Relic Draw Results screen to see detailed results.

series_list.rise_message:
-Bonus Drop Rate Details
The drop rate of relics shown in the banners for this Relic Draw is higher than the drop rates of other relics of the same rarity.
Only relics shown in the banners have higher drop rates, and the higher drop rates expire when this Relic Draw ends.
NOTE: A "higher drop rate" only applies to the drop rate of relics of the same rarity (e.g. 5★ vs. 5★). It does not affect the likelihood that relics of different rarities will drop (e.g. 5★ vs. 4★).
To compare the rarity and drop rates of 1★, 2★, 3★, 4★, 5★, and 6★ relics, please see Menu > HELP > Other > About Rarity.
The 5★ and higher relics in this Relic Draw are made up of a selection of relics with Soul Breaks or Legend Materia that can be learned by the heroes who are displayed on the banner.
* Please see the Relics menu for details on relic lineups.

-Guaranteed 5★ or Higher Relic in Rare Relic Draw x11
One 5★ or higher relic is guaranteed to drop in each Rare Relic Draw x11.
* The 5★ or higher guaranteed relic drop rate only applies to Rare Relic Draw x11. It does not apply to Rare Relic Draw or Rare Relic Draw x3.
* In a Rare Relic Draw and Rare Relic Draw x3, the drop rates of 4★, 5★, and 6★ relics do not change, even if none of these rarities drop after repeated draws.

-Purchasing Relic Draws with Mythril and Gems
If you don't have enough Mythril to purchase a Rare Relic Draw, Rare Relic Draw x3, or Rare Relic Draw x11, you can spend all of your Mythril and use Gems to make up the difference. The number of Gems required is calculated automatically. Please be aware that the number of Gems needed when using a combination of Mythril and Gems differs from the number of Gems needed when using only Gems to purchase a Relic Draw.
* If you have enough Mythril to purchase a given Relic Draw, the option to combine Mythril and Gems will not be available.
* When purchasing a Relic Draw with a combination of Mythril and Gems, all of your Mythril will be used. It is not possible to adjust the amount of Mythril spent.
* It is not possible to combine Mythril and Gems when using the "First Time Special 100 Gems Rare Relic Draw."
* The drop rates of a Relic Draw purchased with a combination of Mythril and Gems are the same as those purchased using only Mythril or only Gems.
NOTE: Relic Draws for some events may not include Relics higher than 5★. Please check the Relics menu of a Relic Draw to see if it includes any 5★ or higher relics.
-Anima Lenses
In this relic draw, you can receive the following Anima Lenses when you draw a relic that you've previously obtained.
6★: Lv 3 Anima Lens x50
5★: Lv 2 Anima Lens x50
4★: Lv 1 Anima Lens x7
3★: Lv 1 Anima Lens x3
* Relics in your Equipment Collection are considered "previously obtained."
* Anima Lenses are acquired automatically.
* 4★ and lower relics that are sold or used to create Rainbow Crystals will still award Anima Lenses.
* Tap the Lenses button at the bottom left of the Relic Draw Results screen to see detailed results.

legend_materia.name: Presidential Prerogative
legend_materia.description: Small chance for offensive dark abilities to trigger twice.

legend_materia.name: First-Class Fighter
legend_materia.description: Small chance for monk abilities to trigger twice.

soul_strike.name: Sublime Doom
soul_strike.description: Deal fifteen ranged physical water, earth, and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of water, temporarily grant the user Awoken Ninja Mode, increase the user's Cap Break Level by 1, and cause every second ninja ability used by the user to trigger the follow-up ability Fleeting Instant, dealing six, eight, or ten ranged physical water, earth, and non-elemental attacks to one target. Number of attacks depends on the Mirror Image stacks on the user.

awake_explanations.description_text: Grant unlimited use of ninja abilities, grant up to a moderate Ninja Ability Boost, and cause the user's ninja abilities to trigger twice.

soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal fifteen ranged physical water, earth, and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of water, temporarily grant the user Awoken Ninja Mode, increase the user's Cap Break Level by 1, and cause every second ninja ability used by the user to trigger the follow-up ability Fleeting Instant, dealing six, eight, or ten ranged physical water, earth, and non-elemental attacks to one target. Number of attacks depends on the Mirror Image stacks on the user.

soul_strike.name: Chain Grand Spark
soul_strike.description: Deal ten physical or magic earth and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of earth, temporarily reduce delay of the user's actions, and cause every third earth ability they use to grant all allies a barrier that negates attack damage up to 30% of their max HP. Attack type depends on the stats of the user.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten physical or magic earth and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of earth, temporarily reduce delay of the user's actions, and cause every third earth ability they use to grant all allies a barrier that negates attack damage up to 30% of their max HP. Attack type depends on the stats of the user.

soul_strike.name: Freewheeling Bloodfest
soul_strike.description: Deal twenty massive ranged physical water attacks, followed by another ranged physical water attack that can break the damage cap, to one enemy.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal twenty massive ranged physical water attacks, followed by another ranged physical water attack that can break the damage cap, to one enemy.

soul_strike.name: Refreshing Breeze
soul_strike.description: Instantly grant Protect, Shell, and Haste to all allies. Does not deplete the Soul Break gauge.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Instantly grant Protect, Shell, and Haste to all allies. Does not deplete the Soul Break gauge.

soul_strike.name: Recreant Son
soul_strike.description: Deal fifteen ranged physical dark and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of the dark, temporarily grant the user Awoken Dark Mode, increase the user's Cap Break Level by 1, and cause every second dark ability the user uses to trigger the follow-up ability Ground Dive, dealing eight ranged physical dark and non-elemental attacks to one target.

awake_explanations.description_text: Grant unlimited use of dark abilities, grant up to a moderate Dark Ability Boost, and cause the user's dark abilities to trigger twice.

soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal fifteen ranged physical dark and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of the dark, temporarily grant the user Awoken Dark Mode, increase the user's Cap Break Level by 1, and cause every second dark ability the user uses to trigger the follow-up ability Ground Dive, dealing eight ranged physical dark and non-elemental attacks to one target.

soul_strike.name: Star Pulse
soul_strike.description: Instantly restore a very large amount of HP to all allies, raise any KO'd allies and restore a very large amount of their HP, reduce delay of all allies' physical attacks for three turns, grant them Haste and Last Stand, and temporarily grant the user Awoken Savior Mode.

awake_explanations.description_text: Grant unlimited use of white magic abilities, reduce delay of the user's white magic abilities, and cause the user's white magic abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Holy Wave, restoring HP to damaged allies, and automatically healing additional damage any allies take. Amount of HP restored depends on the triggering ability's rank (up to 5 ranks).

soul_strike.extensive_description: Instantly restore a very large amount of HP to all allies, raise any KO'd allies and restore a very large amount of their HP, reduce delay of all allies' physical attacks for three turns, grant them Haste and Last Stand, and temporarily grant the user Awoken Savior Mode.

soul_strike.name: Mako Cannon
soul_strike.description: Deal ten ranged physical dark and non-elemental attacks to random enemies, temporarily lower their dark resistance level by 2, and cause every second dark ability the user uses to trigger the follow-up ability Dark Ray, dealing ranged physical dark and non-elemental damage to one target, and temporarily lowering its dark resistance level by 1.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten ranged physical dark and non-elemental attacks to random enemies, temporarily lower their dark resistance level by 2, and cause every second dark ability the user uses to trigger the follow-up ability Dark Ray, dealing ranged physical dark and non-elemental damage to one target, and temporarily lowering its dark resistance level by 1.

soul_strike.name: Reign of Terror
soul_strike.description: Instantly deal six ranged physical dark and non-elemental attacks to all enemies, temporarily lower their Magic a large amount, and cast Dispel on them.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Instantly deal six ranged physical dark and non-elemental attacks to all enemies, temporarily lower their Magic a large amount, and cast Dispel on them.

legend_materia.name: Spacefarer
legend_materia.description: Begin battle with Haste, and remove delay from the user's actions for one turn.

soul_strike.name: Cid in Charge
soul_strike.description: Activate a FF VII realm chain up to 150 hits long that increases the damage of allies from the FF VII realm a large amount, temporarily raise the Attack and Magic of all allies a moderate amount, and grant them Haste.

combo_explanations.effect_text: Increases the damage of FINAL FANTASY VII heroes a large amount.

soul_strike.extensive_description: Activate a FF VII realm chain up to 150 hits long that increases the damage of allies from the FF VII realm a large amount, temporarily raise the Attack and Magic of all allies a moderate amount, and grant them Haste.

soul_strike.name: Earth Rave
soul_strike.description: Deal ten magic earth attacks to one enemy, temporarily grant all allies a barrier that reflects a portion of the damage they take to the attacker as earth damage, and remove delay from all allies' actions for one turn.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten magic earth attacks to one enemy, temporarily grant all allies a barrier that reflects a portion of the damage they take to the attacker as earth damage, and remove delay from all allies' actions for one turn.

soul_strike.name: Meteor Arts
soul_strike.description: Deal fifteen physical earth and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of earth, temporarily grant the user Awoken Monk Mode, increase the user's Cap Break Level by 1, and cause every third monk ability they use to trigger the follow-up ability Gaia Crusher, dealing physical earth and non-elemental damage to one target. Gaia Crusher can break the damage cap.

awake_explanations.description_text: Grant unlimited use of monk abilities, grant up to a moderate Monk Ability Boost, and cause the user's monk abilities to trigger twice.

soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal fifteen physical earth and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of earth, temporarily grant the user Awoken Monk Mode, increase the user's Cap Break Level by 1, and cause every third monk ability they use to trigger the follow-up ability Gaia Crusher, dealing physical earth and non-elemental damage to one target. Gaia Crusher can break the damage cap.

legend_materia.name: Bathed in Blood
legend_materia.description: Begin battle temporarily infused with the power of the dark.

soul_strike.name: Dark Conquest
soul_strike.description: Instantly deal six physical or magic dark and non-elemental attacks to one enemy, and temporarily grant the user Empowered Infusion for dark. Does not deplete the Soul Break gauge. Attack type depends on the user's stats.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Instantly deal six physical or magic dark and non-elemental attacks to one enemy, and temporarily grant the user Empowered Infusion for dark. Does not deplete the Soul Break gauge. Attack type depends on the user's stats.

soul_strike.name: Soothing Wave
soul_strike.description: Instantly restore a very large amount of HP to all allies, raise any KO'd allies and restore a very large amount of their HP, grant all allies Last Stand, Haste, and a barrier that enables them to avoid one debuff, cast Esuna on them, and temporarily grant the user Awoken Potion Mode.

awake_explanations.description_text: Grant unlimited use of white magic abilities, reduce delay of the user's white magic abilities by an amount based on the rank of the ability used, and cause the user's white magic abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Custom Potion, restoring 1,500 HP to all allies, and casting Esuna on them.

soul_strike.extensive_description: Instantly restore a very large amount of HP to all allies, raise any KO'd allies and restore a very large amount of their HP, grant all allies Last Stand, Haste, and a barrier that enables them to avoid one debuff, cast Esuna on them, and temporarily grant the user Awoken Potion Mode.

soul_strike.name: Prodigal Son
soul_strike.description: Activate a FF XII realm chain up to 150 hits long that increases the damage of allies from the FF XII realm a large amount, temporarily raise the Attack and Magic of all allies a moderate amount, and grant them Haste.

combo_explanations.effect_text: Increases the damage of FINAL FANTASY XII heroes a large amount.

soul_strike.extensive_description: Activate a FF XII realm chain up to 150 hits long that increases the damage of allies from the FF XII realm a large amount, temporarily raise the Attack and Magic of all allies a moderate amount, and grant them Haste.

legend_materia.name: Steady Copilot
legend_materia.description: Begin battle temporarily infused with the power of ice.

soul_strike.name: Scintillating Potion
soul_strike.description: Instantly restore a large amount of HP to all allies, reduce delay of their actions for two turns, and temporarily cause the user's white magic and support abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Prodigious Stratagem, restoring 1,000 HP to all allies, and casting Esuna on them.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Instantly restore a large amount of HP to all allies, reduce delay of their actions for two turns, and temporarily cause the user's white magic and support abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Prodigious Stratagem, restoring 1,000 HP to all allies, and casting Esuna on them.

soul_strike.name: Alabaster Path
soul_strike.description: Instantly grant Protect, Shell, and Haste to all allies. Does not deplete the Soul Break gauge.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Instantly grant Protect, Shell, and Haste to all allies. Does not deplete the Soul Break gauge.

soul_strike.name: Sparkchill Fang
soul_strike.description: Deal ten instant ranged physical ice and lightning attacks to random enemies, briefly lower their Attack, Magic, and Defense a very large amount, and remove delay from the user's actions for one turn.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten instant ranged physical ice and lightning attacks to random enemies, briefly lower their Attack, Magic, and Defense a very large amount, and remove delay from the user's actions for one turn.

soul_strike.name: Military Manifesto
soul_strike.description: Deal fifteen physical or magic dark and non-elemental attacks to one target, remove delay from the user's actions for one turn, temporarily raise the user's Attack or Magic a large amount and Defense a moderate amount, infuse the user with the power of the dark, temporarily grant the user Awoken Darkness Mode, and increase the user's Cap Break Level by 1. Attack type and stat raised depends on the user's stats.

awake_explanations.description_text: Grant unlimited use of darkness abilities, grant up to a moderate Darkness Ability Boost, and causes the user's darkness abilities to trigger twice.

soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal fifteen physical or magic dark and non-elemental attacks to one target, remove delay from the user's actions for one turn, temporarily raise the user's Attack or Magic a large amount and Defense a moderate amount, infuse the user with the power of the dark, temporarily grant the user Awoken Darkness Mode, and increase the user's Cap Break Level by 1. Attack type and stat raised depends on the user's stats.

soul_strike.name: Wild Frolic
soul_strike.description: Deal fifteen ranged physical ice, lightning, and non-elemental attacks to one enemy, temporarily infuse the user with the power of ice, temporarily grant them Awoken Ice Mode, increase their Cap Break Level by 1, and cause every second ice ability they use to trigger the follow-up ability Viera Shot.

awake_explanations.description_text: Grant unlimited use of ice abilities, grant up to a moderate Ice Ability Boost, and cause the user's ice abilities to trigger twice.

soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal fifteen ranged physical ice, lightning, and non-elemental attacks to one enemy, temporarily infuse the user with the power of ice, temporarily grant them Awoken Ice Mode, increase their Cap Break Level by 1, and cause every second ice ability they use to trigger the follow-up ability Viera Shot.

legend_materia.name: Dead Shot
legend_materia.description: Small chance for sharpshooter and machinist abilities to trigger twice.

soul_strike.name: Relentless Drive
soul_strike.description: Deal ten physical or magic dark and non-elemental attacks to one enemy, temporarily infuse the user with the power of the dark, remove delay from the actions of all allies for one turn, temporarily grant Bravery Mode to the user, and set their Bravery Level to 2. Attack type depends on the user's stats.

brave_abilities.name: Cast Below

brave_abilities.name: Cast Below
brave_abilities.description: Deal physical or magic dark damage to one enemy. Attack type depends on the user's stats. Can break the damage cap.

brave_abilities.name: Cast Below

soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten physical or magic dark and non-elemental attacks to one enemy, temporarily infuse the user with the power of the dark, remove delay from the actions of all allies for one turn, temporarily grant Bravery Mode to the user, and set their Bravery Level to 2. legend_materia.name: Precocious Wisdom
legend_materia.description: Small chance for white magic abilities to restore a small amount of HP to all allies.

soul_strike.name: Soaring Spirits
soul_strike.description: Deal twenty massive physical or magic dark attacks to one enemy, followed by an additional physical or magic dark attack that can break the damage cap. Attack type depends on the user's stats.

series_list.rise_message:
-Bonus Drop Rate Details
The drop rate of relics shown in the banners for this Relic Draw is higher than the drop rates of other relics of the same rarity.
Only relics shown in the banners have higher drop rates, and the higher drop rates expire when this Relic Draw ends.
NOTE: A "higher drop rate" only applies to the drop rate of relics of the same rarity (e.g. 5★ vs. 5★). It does not affect the likelihood that relics of different rarities will drop (e.g. 5★ vs. 4★).
To compare the rarity and drop rates of 1★, 2★, 3★, 4★, 5★, and 6★ relics, please see Menu > HELP > Other > About Rarity.
The 5★ and higher relics in this Relic Draw are made up of a selection of relics with Soul Breaks or Legend Materia that can be learned by the heroes who are displayed on the banner.
* Please see the Relics menu for details on relic lineups.

-Guaranteed 5★ or Higher Relics in Rare Relic Draw x11
Two 5★ or higher relics are guaranteed to drop in each Rare Relic Draw x11.
* The 5★ or higher guaranteed relic drop rate only applies to Rare Relic Draw x11. It does not apply to Rare Relic Draw or Rare Relic Draw x3.
* In a Rare Relic Draw and Rare Relic Draw x3, the drop rates of 4★, 5★, and 6★ relics do not change, even if none of these rarities drop after repeated draws.

-Purchasing Relic Draws with Mythril and Gems
If you don't have enough Mythril to purchase a Rare Relic Draw, Rare Relic Draw x3, or Rare Relic Draw x11, you can spend all of your Mythril and use Gems to make up the difference. The number of Gems required is calculated automatically. Please be aware that the number of Gems needed when using a combination of Mythril and Gems differs from the number of Gems needed when using only Gems to purchase a Relic Draw.
* If you have enough Mythril to purchase a given Relic Draw, the option to combine Mythril and Gems will not be available.
* When purchasing a Relic Draw with a combination of Mythril and Gems, all of your Mythril will be used. It is not possible to adjust the amount of Mythril spent.
* It is not possible to combine Mythril and Gems when using the "First Time Special 100 Gems Rare Relic Draw."
* The drop rates of a Relic Draw purchased with a combination of Mythril and Gems are the same as those purchased using only Mythril or only Gems.
NOTE: Relic Draws for some events may not include Relics higher than 5★. Please check the Relics menu of a Relic Draw to see if it includes any 5★ or higher relics.

-Anima Lenses
In this relic draw, you can receive the following Anima Lenses when you draw a relic that you've previously obtained.
6★: Lv 3 Anima Lens x50
5★: Lv 2 Anima Lens x50
4★: Lv 1 Anima Lens x7
3★: Lv 1 Anima Lens x3
* Relics in your Equipment Collection are considered "previously obtained."
* Anima Lenses are acquired automatically.
* 4★ and lower relics that are sold or used to create Rainbow Crystals will still award Anima Lenses.
* Tap the Lenses button at the bottom left of the Relic Draw Results screen to see detailed results.

NOTE: Relic Draws for some events may not include Relics higher than 5★. Please check the Relics menu of a Relic Draw to see if it includes any 5★ or higher relics.

* Anima Lenses are acquired automatically.

* Tap the Lenses button at the bottom left of the Relic Draw Results screen to see detailed results.

-Bonus Drop Rate Details
This Relic Draw does not have a drop rate bonus. The 5★ or higher relics that drop in this Relic Draw are always Soul Break relics of the specified type or Legend Materia.

-Guaranteed 5★ or Higher Relic in Rare Relic Draw x3
One 5★ or higher relic is guaranteed to drop in each Rare Relic Draw x3.

-Purchasing Relic Draws with Mythril and Gems
If you don’t have enough Mythril to purchase a Rare Relic Draw, Rare Relic Draw x3, or Rare Relic Draw x11, you can spend all of your Mythril and use Gems to make up the difference. The number of Gems required is calculated automatically. Please be aware that the number of Gems needed when using a combination of Mythril and Gems differs from the number of Gems needed when using only Gems to purchase a Relic Draw.
* If you have enough Mythril to purchase a given Relic Draw, the option to combine Mythril and Gems will not be available.
* When purchasing a Relic Draw with a combination of Mythril and Gems, all of your Mythril will be used. It is not possible to adjust the amount of Mythril spent.
* The drop rates of a Relic Draw purchased with a combination of Mythril and Gems are the same as those purchased using only Mythril or only Gems.
NOTE: Relic Draws for some events may not include Relics higher than 5★. Please check the Relics menu of a Relic Draw to see if it includes any 5★ or higher relics.


-Anima Lenses
In this relic draw, you can receive the following Anima Lenses when you draw a relic that you've previously obtained.
6★: Lv 3 Anima Lens x50
5★: Lv 2 Anima Lens x50
4★: Lv 1 Anima Lens x7
3★: Lv 1 Anima Lens x3
* Relics in your Equipment Collection are considered "previously obtained."
* Anima Lenses are acquired automatically.
* 4★ and lower relics that are sold or used to create Rainbow Crystals will still award Anima Lenses.
* Tap the Lenses button at the bottom left of the Relic Draw Results screen to see detailed results.

soul_strike.name: Law of the Eidolons
soul_strike.description: Deal six summon magic water and holy attacks to all enemies, temporarily lower their water resistance level by 2, and grant Haste and Burst Mode to the user.

burst_spare_abilities.name: Gift the Eidolon King
burst_spare_abilities.description: Deal four summon magic water and holy attacks to one target, and reduce the user's offensive magic casting time for two turns.

burst_spare_abilities.name: Gift the Eidolon Queen
burst_spare_abilities.description: Deal two summon magic water and holy attacks to one target, and restore one ability use to the user's ability with the fewest remaining uses.

soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal six summon magic water and holy attacks to all enemies, temporarily lower their water resistance level by 2, and grant Haste and Burst Mode to the user.

soul_strike.name: Dagger of Resolve
soul_strike.description: Deal three summoning magic lightning and holy attacks to all targets, and grant Haste and Burst Mode to the user.

burst_spare_abilities.name: Healing Light
burst_spare_abilities.description: Restore a very large amount of HP and cast Esuna on the target.

burst_spare_abilities.name: Ramuh's Judgment
burst_spare_abilities.description: Deal two summoning magic lightning and holy attacks to all targets.

soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal three summoning magic lightning and holy attacks to all targets, and grant Haste and Burst Mode to the user.

soul_strike.name: Aerial Blast
soul_strike.description: Deal eight summon magic wind and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of wind, and grant Haste and Burst Mode to the user.

burst_spare_abilities.name: Wind Blade
burst_spare_abilities.description: Deal four summon magic wind and non-elemental attacks to one target, and remove delay from the user's next action.

burst_spare_abilities.name: Aetherflow
burst_spare_abilities.description: Deal two summon magic wind and non-elemental attacks to one target, and restore one ability use to the user's ability with the fewest remaining uses.

soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal eight summon magic wind and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of wind, and grant Haste and Burst Mode to the user.

series_list.rise_message:
-Bonus Drop Rate Details
This Relic Draw does not have a drop rate bonus. The 5★ or higher relics that drop in this Relic Draw are always Soul Break relics of the specified type or Legend Materia.

-Guaranteed 5★ or Higher Relic in Rare Relic Draw x3
One 5★ or higher relic is guaranteed to drop in each Rare Relic Draw x3.

-Purchasing Relic Draws with Mythril and Gems
If you don’t have enough Mythril to purchase a Rare Relic Draw, Rare Relic Draw x3, or Rare Relic Draw x11, you can spend all of your Mythril and use Gems to make up the difference. The number of Gems required is calculated automatically. Please be aware that the number of Gems needed when using a combination of Mythril and Gems differs from the number of Gems needed when using only Gems to purchase a Relic Draw.
* If you have enough Mythril to purchase a given Relic Draw, the option to combine Mythril and Gems will not be available.
* When purchasing a Relic Draw with a combination of Mythril and Gems, all of your Mythril will be used. It is not possible to adjust the amount of Mythril spent.
* The drop rates of a Relic Draw purchased with a combination of Mythril and Gems are the same as those purchased using only Mythril or only Gems.
NOTE: Relic Draws for some events may not include Relics higher than 5★. Please check the Relics menu of a Relic Draw to see if it includes any 5★ or higher relics.


-Anima Lenses
In this relic draw, you can receive the following Anima Lenses when you draw a relic that you've previously obtained.
6★: Lv 3 Anima Lens x50
5★: Lv 2 Anima Lens x50
4★: Lv 1 Anima Lens x7
3★: Lv 1 Anima Lens x3
* Relics in your Equipment Collection are considered "previously obtained."
* Anima Lenses are acquired automatically.
* 4★ and lower relics that are sold or used to create Rainbow Crystals will still award Anima Lenses.
* Tap the Lenses button at the bottom left of the Relic Draw Results screen to see detailed results.

series_list.rise_message:
-Bonus Drop Rate Details
This Relic Draw does not have a drop rate bonus. The 5★ or higher relics that drop in this Relic Draw are always Soul Break relics of the specified type or Legend Materia.

-Guaranteed 5★ or Higher Relic in Rare Relic Draw x3
One 5★ or higher relic is guaranteed to drop in each Rare Relic Draw x3.

-Purchasing Relic Draws with Mythril and Gems
If you don’t have enough Mythril to purchase a Rare Relic Draw, Rare Relic Draw x3, or Rare Relic Draw x11, you can spend all of your Mythril and use Gems to make up the difference. The number of Gems required is calculated automatically. Please be aware that the number of Gems needed when using a combination of Mythril and Gems differs from the number of Gems needed when using only Gems to purchase a Relic Draw.
* If you have enough Mythril to purchase a given Relic Draw, the option to combine Mythril and Gems will not be available.
* When purchasing a Relic Draw with a combination of Mythril and Gems, all of your Mythril will be used. It is not possible to adjust the amount of Mythril spent.
* The drop rates of a Relic Draw purchased with a combination of Mythril and Gems are the same as those purchased using only Mythril or only Gems.
NOTE: Relic Draws for some events may not include Relics higher than 5★. Please check the Relics menu of a Relic Draw to see if it includes any 5★ or higher relics.


-Anima Lenses
In this relic draw, you can receive the following Anima Lenses when you draw a relic that you've previously obtained.
6★: Lv 3 Anima Lens x50
5★: Lv 2 Anima Lens x50
4★: Lv 1 Anima Lens x7
3★: Lv 1 Anima Lens x3
* Relics in your Equipment Collection are considered "previously obtained."
* Anima Lenses are acquired automatically.
* 4★ and lower relics that are sold or used to create Rainbow Crystals will still award Anima Lenses.
* Tap the Lenses button at the bottom left of the Relic Draw Results screen to see detailed results.
